query:
SELECT
        s.*,
        jsonb_agg(
            jsonb_build_object(
                'id',
                brs.route_id,
                'direction',
                brs.direction,
                'headsign',
                brs.headsign
            )
        ) AS routes
    FROM
        bus_stops s
        LEFT JOIN bus_route_stops brs ON brs.stop_id = s.id
    GROUP BY
        s.id;
